textBeforeTable: Run Time: 0.004128 WHERE data_key IN ('options', 'languages', 'contentTypes', 'codeEventListeners', 'cron', 'simpleCache', 'routesPublic', 'nodeTypes', 'bannedIps', 'discouragedIps', 'styles', 'displayStyles', 'smilies', 'bbCode', 'threadPrefixes', 'trophyUserTitles', 'reportCounts', 'moderationCounts', 'notices', 'userFieldsInfo') FROM xf_data_registry SELECT data_key, data_value   Queries (18, time: 0.0594s, 13.0%) Memory: 10.3482 MB (Peak: 11.1283 MB) Page Time: 0.4565s
textAfterTable: LEFT JOIN xf_user AS user ON (user.user_id = thread.user_id) LEFT JOIN xf_thread_rpg AS threadRpg ON (thread.thread_id = threadRpg.thread_id) WHERE thread.thread_id = ?
